B2B_Feedback: Common complaints: 'Velcro useless after a month', 'handles ripped off', 'shrunk in wash'. High return rate but no injuries. Quality issue only.
Amazon_Feedback: HIGH RETURN RATE (35%) but not safety-related. Design issue: Industrial Velcro spec'd but supplier using commercial grade. Redesign scheduled Q2 2026. Switch to sewn loops + metal D-rings. Estimated improvement: 35% → 8% return rate.

Manual_Context: foam wrap). Cost: $2.50/unit. Expected return reduction: 13% → 5%. ROI positive in 6 months.
